cs.DC, cs.OS, cs.NI, cs.PF, cs.Distributed Systems. 

The paper discusses a new approach for checkpointing and restarting InfiniBand networks, which is a key technology for high-performance computing clusters. This topic is closely related to distributed computing (cs.DC), operating systems (cs.OS), network infrastructure (cs.NI), parallel and distributed computing (cs.PF), and distributed systems (cs.Distributed Systems). Therefore, these are the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories for this paper, ordered from most to least likely.
